title: Ordinal Date
guide:
### Accumulated Days
Add current day to month base.

| Month | Base | Month | Base |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Jan** | 0 | **Jul** | 181 |
| **Feb** | 31 | **Aug** | 212 |
| **Mar** | 59 | **Sep** | 243 |
| **Apr** | 90 | **Oct** | 273 |
| **May** | 120 | **Nov** | 304 |
| **Jun** | 151 | **Dec** | 334 |

*Note: If Leap and >Feb 29, add +1.*
